project.name: Local Prod ServiceNow Incident from BHOM to SNOW using update SNOW connector and fix for State change issue
project.description: This template integrates ServiceNow and BMC Helix Operations Management to automate the creation and update of ServiceNow incidents when a BMC Helix Operations Management event is created or updated.

operations.name: Delete API and Security Profile if needed

components.name: HOM Parse API Key
components.scriptBody:
<trans>

// Validate HTTP Status Code
RunScript("<TAG>script:Validate HTTP Status Code</TAG>", "Failed to generate HOM API Token", 200, "jitterbit.source.http.status_code");

// Parse JSON
RunScript("<TAG>script:Parse JSON</TAG>");

// Set HOM JWT Token
$homToken = $jsonObj["_object"]["apiKey"];

</trans>

$homToken = $jsonObj["_object"]["apiKey"];

</trans>

components.name: Logging and Notification Rollup
components.scriptBody:
<trans>
/*
Reads logging files set in the Canonical to Target portion of the project. Prints
out the success/failure counters and emails data erros (if $BHIP_Email_Data_Error == true) 
as well as a summary (if $BHIP_Email_Summary == true) of the integration.

Files written in Canonical to Target:
  - Success Count
  - Failure Count
  - Data Error
  - Summary Log
*/

WriteToOperationLog("--------Integration Summary-------------");
WriteToOperationLog("Success Count " + $successCount);
WriteToOperationLog("Failure Count " + $failureCount);


RunScript("<TAG>script:Setup Email Notification</TAG>");

$successCount = If($successCount < 0, WriteToOperationLog("No Success Count File Found"));
$failureCount = If($failureCount < 0, WriteToOperationLog("No Failure Count File Found"));


WriteToOperationLog("Email content for Error ::"+$dataErrors);
// send data erros to the configured recipients
WriteToOperationLog("Email content for Success ::"+$summaryData);


// send data erros to the configured recipients
If($BHIP_Email_Enabled, 
WriteToOperationLog("about to send email");
If($BHIP_Email_Data_Error == 'true' && Length($errorLogs) != 0,
$EmailSubject = "HOM EVENT -> SERVICE NOW INCIDENT";
$EmailMessage = If(Length($errorLogs) == 0 ,"No Data Error File Found", "Data Error\n" +$dataErrors);
emailErrorMessage =  SendEmailMessage("<TAG>email:Log Results</TAG>");
WriteToOperationLog("this is from email_data_error = true;" + emailErrorMessage);
If(Bool(Length(emailErrorMessage)),
  WriteToOperationLog("Failed to send email. Error message: " + emailErrorMessage);
  );
);

// send a summary of the integration to the configured recipients
If($BHIP_Email_Summary == 'true',
$EmailSubject ="HOM EVENT -> SERVICE NOW INCIDENT";
$EmailMessage = If(Length($summaryLogs) == 0 ,"No Summary Log File Found", "Summary\n" +$summaryData);
emailErrorMessage = SendEmailMessage("<TAG>email:Log Results</TAG>");
WriteToOperationLog("this is from email_summary = true;" + emailErrorMessage);
If(Bool(Length(emailErrorMessage)),
  WriteToOperationLog("Failed to send email. Error message: " + emailErrorMessage);
  );
);
);

</trans>
components.scriptBodyCleansed:

RunScript("<TAG>script:Setup Email Notification</TAG>");

$successCount = If($successCount < 0, WriteToOperationLog("No Success Count File Found"));
$failureCount = If($failureCount < 0, WriteToOperationLog("No Failure Count File Found"));


WriteToOperationLog("Email content for Error ::"+$dataErrors);

components.name: Get Operation Id
components.scriptBody:
<javascript>
WriteToOperationLog(".............. Insdie Get Operation ID Script : ....... ")
whTriggerPjt=$BHIP_Project_Name;
whTriggerOperation=$BHIP_Operation_Name;
var projArr=JSON.parse($operationResp);
$projectId=0
$operationId=0

projArr.forEach(function(eachProj) {
		projName=eachProj.name;
    projId=eachProj.id;
		
    if (projName == whTriggerPjt){
    	$projectId=projId;
      
    	eachProj['operations'].forEach(function(eachOper){
     	
      	operName = eachOper.name;
        operId = eachOper.id;
        
        if (operName == whTriggerOperation){
        $operationId=operId;
      	WriteToOperationLog(".............. Insdie Get Operation ID Script......... Project id is : "+projId);
        WriteToOperationLog(".............. Insdie Get Operation ID Script......... Operation id is : "+operId);
        }
      });
    }
    //WriteToOperationLog('----------------------------------------------------------');
});

if ($projectId == 0){
 	SetScriptResult("Unable to find the Project : "+whTriggerProject);
}


if ($operationId == 0){
 	SetScriptResult("Unable to find the Operation : "+whTriggerOperation);
}

</javascript>

components.name: Driver
components.scriptBody:
<trans>

$requestBody = $jitterbit.api.request.body;
WriteToOperationLog("Incoming Request BHOM payload :"+$requestBody);
$snowHomCommentPrefix="Updated by SNOW";
$homSnowCommentPrefix="Updated by HOM";


//Var to handle if snow tkt is in closed state, no update should happen 
//Closed = 7, Resolved=6
snowClosureTktStatus = {7,6};

$bhom_caller="Alert";
RunScript("<TAG>script:Parse Webhook Payload</TAG>");
WriteToOperationLog("$json['action']:"+ $json['action']);
if(ToUpper($json['action']) == 'INCIDENT',
  	WriteToOperationLog("Webhook creation call, so skipping it");
,

//WriteToOperationLog("HOM Payload : "+$requestBody);
$errorLogs="";
RunScript("<TAG>script:Parse HOM Payload</TAG>");
WriteToOperationLog("out of Parse HOM Payload");
WriteToOperationLog($eventId + $msg);
status = RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Query Correlation Id</TAG>");
//status = RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Query Correlation id - HTTP</TAG>");
$sysIdSnow=$queriedSysId;
//WriteToOperationLog("Sys id :"+$sysIdSnow+ ";;;;;;;");


if($errorLogs == "",
if($queriedCorrelationId == $eventId ,
	//status = RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Query Correlation Id</TAG>");
	//status = RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Query Incident ID</TAG>");
  //status = RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Query Correlation id - HTTP</TAG>");
	actionType = "update"; 
,

	actionType = "create";
);
WriteToOperationLog("Action Type set as : "+actionType);

RunScript("<TAG>script:SNOW  HOM Mapping</TAG>");

$snowWorkNotes = "";
if(actionType=="create" && $errorLogs == "" && $status != 'CLOSED',
	
	if($lastNotesValue != "",
		$snowWorkNotes = $snowWorkNotes+$lastNotesValue+"\n";
    );
    
   if($snowWorkNotes != "", 
  		$snowWorkNotes =  $homSnowCommentPrefix + ": "+$snowWorkNotes;, 
      $snowWorkNotes = $homSnowCommentPrefix + " : Ticket created by HOM";
      $BHOM_notes = $snowWorkNotes;
    );
    WriteToOperationLog("call for first cmdb query : starting now,cdmclass="+$BHOM_cdmclass);
    //$BHOM_cdmclass='server';
    if($BHOM_cdmclass=='server' ,
    	  WriteToOperationLog("call for first cmdb query : calling server query ");
        //RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Query CI server - HTTP</TAG>");
        RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Query CI server</TAG>");
        );
        
    if($BHOM_cdmclass=='ip_router'  ,
    		WriteToOperationLog("call for first cmdb query : calling router query "+$BHOM_ci_id);
        //RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Query CI router - HTTP</TAG>");
        RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Query CI Router</TAG>");
           ); 
           
    if($BHOM_cdmclass=='ip_switch' | $BHOM_cdmclass=='vpn' | $BHOM_cdmclass=='firewall' ,
    	  WriteToOperationLog("call for first cmdb query : calling switch query ");
        //RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Query CI switch - HTTP</TAG>");
        RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Query CI Switch</TAG>")                         
               );
      
    if($BHOM_cdmclass=='application' ,
    		WriteToOperationLog("call for first cmdb query : calling application query ");
        //RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Query CI application - HTTP</TAG>");
        RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Query CI application</TAG>");
        );
        
     if($BHOM_componentalias=='Test_BMC_Database_Middleware_Operations' ,
    		WriteToOperationLog("call for first cmdb query : calling cmdb ci query ");
        //RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Query CI CMDB CI - HTTP</TAG>");
        RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Query CI CMDB</TAG>");
        //RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Query CI application</TAG>");
        );       
    
    if($BHOM_cdmclass=='database' & $BHOM_componentalias!='Test_BMC_Database_Middleware_Operations',
    		WriteToOperationLog("call for first cmdb query : calling database query ");
        //RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Query CI database - HTTP</TAG>");
        RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Query CI database</TAG>");
        );
        
    if($BHOM_cdmclass=='storage' ,
    		WriteToOperationLog("call for first cmdb query : calling server query ");
        //RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Query CI server - HTTP</TAG>");
        RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Query CI server</TAG>") 
        );
        
    if($BHOM_cdmclass=='cloud' ,
    		WriteToOperationLog("call for first cmdb query : calling cloud query ");
        
        RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Query CI data cloud</TAG>") //Unknow operation
        );
        
    if($BHOM_cdmclass=='filesystem' ,
    		WriteToOperationLog("call for first cmdb query : calling app query ");
        RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Query CI data app</TAG>") //Unknow operation
        );
        
    if($BHOM_cdmclass=='middleware' ,
    		WriteToOperationLog("call for first cmdb query : calling app query ");
        RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Query CI data app</TAG>") //Unknow operation
        );
        
    if($BHOM_cdmclass=='network' | $BHOM_cdmclass=='vpn' | $BHOM_cdmclass=='firewall' ,
    		WriteToOperationLog("call for first cmdb query : calling server query ");
        RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Query CI Router</TAG>");
        //RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Query CI netgear - HTTP</TAG>");
        //RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Query CI server</TAG>") 
        );
    
    WriteToOperationLog("call for first cmdb query : ending now , Sysid for CI = " +$BHOM_ci_id);
    //If Ci not found then update request 
    $ci_not_found=0;
    if($BHOM_ci_id =='' ,  $ci_not_found=1 );
    //if($BHOM_ci_id =='' ,
       //WriteToOperationLog("call for second cmdb query : calling now , instance for CI = " +$BHOM_instancename);
       //RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Query CI data 2</TAG>");
      // WriteToOperationLog("call for second cmdb query : ending now , Sysid for CI = " +$BHOM_ci_id);
    //);
    
    
	//status = RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Create ServiceNow Incident - HTTP</TAG>",true);
  status = RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Create Incident In ServiceNow</TAG>");
  WriteToOperationLog("Status of Servicenow incident creation :"+status);
  
  if(status,
  	status = RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Query Correlation Id</TAG>");
    //RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Query Correlation id - HTTP</TAG>",false);
  	RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Update Incident Number In HOM</TAG>",false);
    ,
    WriteToOperationLog("******************************************************");
    WriteToOperationLog("Servicenow incident creation failed");
    WriteToOperationLog(GetLastError());
    WriteToOperationLog("******************************************************");
    
  );
  
  if($errorLogs == "",
  	RunOperation("<TAG>operation:HOM Callback Response</TAG>");
  
  
  );
  
  );


if(actionType=="update" && $errorLogs == "" && $status != 'CLOSED',
 
	// this jsonobj comes from the operation call Query incident id
/**	
	$queriedSnowTktStatus = $jsonObj["result"]["incident_state"]["value"];
	$queriedSnowIncidentNumber = $jsonObj["result"]["number"]["value"];
	$queriedSnowCloseCode = $jsonObj["result"]["number"]["value"];
	$queriedSnowCloseNotes = $jsonObj["result"]["close_code"]["value"];
  $queriedSnowUrgency = $jsonObj["result"]["urgency"]["value"];
  $queriedSnowImpact = $jsonObj["result"]["impact"]["value"];
	$querySnowWorkNotes = Split($jsonObj["result"]["comments_and_work_notes"]["display_value"],"\n")[1];
  **/
  //RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Query worknotes - HTTP</TAG>");
  WriteToOperationLog("Last Work notes in Snow : "+ $querySnowWorkNotes);
	WriteToOperationLog("Queried snow tket status : "+$queriedSnowTktStatus);
  RunScript("<TAG>script:Validate and create Snow Update Payload</TAG>");
   WriteToOperationLog("incoming HOM Status coming from Driver script" + $statecheck);
  if($snowUpdatePayload != "{}" && !Exist($queriedSnowTktStatus, snowClosureTktStatus) ,
  $createServiceNowPayload= $snowUpdatePayload;
  	WriteToOperationLog("createServiceNowPayload ...:"+ $createServiceNowPayload);
    status = RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Update Snow Through API</TAG>");
    if(status ,
      RunOperation("<TAG>operation:HOM Callback Response</TAG>");
    );
  );
	
);
);

if($errorLogs != "",

   WriteToOperationLog("Api failed sending response as per message");
   RunScript("<TAG>script:Set Api Response Code</TAG>");
   
   $jitterbit.api.response.status_code = $apiResponseStatus;
   $jitterbit.api.response='{"errorMsg" : ' + $errorLogs+ ' }';

);

);


</trans>

components.scriptBody:
<trans>
WriteToOperationLog("Parsing done");
//RunScript("<TAG>script:Parse ServiceNow Login Response</TAG>");

WriteToOperationLog($SnowLoginjson);
$isWebhookRegister = false;
//$access_token = "Bearer "+$SnowLoginjson["access_token"];

$i=0;
system_property = Array();
system_property[0]= "sys_properties";
system_property[1]=$SNOW_Webhook_Property_Name;
system_property[2]="{\"is_private\":\"false\",\"ignore_cache\":\"false\",\"description\":\"Endpoint for webhook system property\",\"suffix\":\"\",\"sys_tags\":\"\",\"type\":\"string\",\"write_roles\":\"\",\"name\":\""+$SNOW_Webhook_Property_Name+" \",\"read_roles\":\"\",\"choices\":\"\",\"value\":\"" + $api_url + $snowEndPointPath +"\",\"sys_created_by\":\"admin\",\"sys_policy\":null}";

system_property_AuthPassword[2]="{\"is_private\":\"false\",\"ignore_cache\":\"false\",\"description\":\"Auth Profile user password for webhook system property\",\"suffix\":\"\",\"sys_tags\":\"\",\"type\":\"password\",\"write_roles\":\"\",\"name\":\""+$SNOW_Webhook_Basic_Password+" \",\"read_roles\":\"\",\"choices\":\"\",\"value\":\""+$BHIP_Integration_API_Security_Profile_BASIC_Auth_Password+"\",\"sys_created_by\":\"admin\",\"sys_policy\":null}";

WriteToOperationLog("Payload for sys api pasword:"+ system_property_ApiKey[2]);

business_rule[0]="sys_script";
business_rule[1]=$SNOW_Webhook_Business_Rule_Name;
business_rule[2]="{\"client_callable\":\"false\",\"template\":\"\",\"access\":\"This application scope only\",\"action_insert\":\"false\",\"action_update\":\"true\",\"advanced\":\"true\",\"action_delete\":\"false\",\"change_fields\":\"false\",\"description\":\"\",\"action_query\":\"false\",\"when\":\"after\",\"is_rest\":\"false\",\"rest_method_text\":\"\",\"rest_service_text\":\"\",\"order\":\"500\",\"rest_method\":\"\",\"rest_service\":\"\",\"add_message\":\"false\",\"active\":\"true\",\"collection\":\"incident\",\"message\":null,\"priority\":\"100\",\"script\":\"(function executeRule(current, previous \/*null when async*\/) {\\r\\n\\r\\n\\tgs.info(\\\"Send new incident: '\\\"+ current.number +\\\"' to jitterbit.\\\");\\r\\n\\tvar fields = current.getFields();\\r\\n\\tvar result = {};\\r\\n\\tfor (var i = 0; i < fields.size(); i++) { \\r\\n\\t\\tvar field = fields.get(i);\\r\\n\\t\\tvar name = field.getName(); \\r\\n\\t\\tvar value = field.getValue(); \\r\\n\\t\\tvar displayValue = field.getDisplayValue(); \\r\\n\\t\\tresult[name] = {value:value, display_value:displayValue};\\r\\n\\t}\\r\\n\\t\\r\\n\\tvar sysId = current.sys_id.toString();\\r\\n\\tresult['sys_id'] = {value: sysId, display_value: sysId};\\r\\n\\t\\r\\n\\tvar sender = new "+$SNOW_Webhook_Script_Include_Name+"();\\r\\n\\tvar endpoint = gs.getProperty('"+ $SNOW_Webhook_Property_Name+"');\\r\\n\\t\\r\\n\\tsender.send(result,endpoint);\\r\\n\\r\\n})(current, previous);\",\"abort_action\":\"false\",\"execute_function\":\"false\",\"filter_condition\":\"opened_by= " +$Servicenow_user_name+ "\",\"rest_variables\":\"\",\"name\":\""+ $SNOW_Webhook_Business_Rule_Name+"\",\"role_conditions\":\"\"}";
WriteToOperationLog("Payload for sys business:"+ business_rule[2]);



script_include = Array();
script_include[0]="sys_script_include";
script_include[1]=$SNOW_Webhook_Script_Include_Name;

WriteToOperationLog("Profile type"+$BHIP_Webhook_Security_Profile_Type  );
script_include[2] = Case($BHIP_Webhook_Security_Profile_Type== "BASIC", "{\"client_callable\":\"false\",\"access\":\"public\",\"active\":\"true\",\"description\":\"Post payload object to endpoint.\",\"script\":\"var "+$SNOW_Webhook_Script_Include_Name+" = Class.create();\\r\\n \\r\\n"+$SNOW_Webhook_Script_Include_Name+".prototype = {\\r\\n    'endpoint': '',\\r\\n    'method': 'post',\\r\\n    'payload': {},\\r\\n    'type': '"+$SNOW_Webhook_Script_Include_Name+"',\\r\\n    'send': function (payload, endpoint) {\\r\\n        \/\/Set Payload and Endpoint\\r\\n        this.payload = payload;\\r\\n\\t\\tvar encoded_payload = JSON.stringify(this.payload);\\r\\n\\t\\tgs.info(\\\""+$SNOW_Webhook_Script_Include_Name+" payload \\\"+encoded_payload);\\r\\n\\t\\tthis.endpoint = endpoint;\\r\\n\\t\\tif(gs.hasRole(\\\"admin\\\")){\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tgs.debug(\\\"Sending payload \\\" + encoded_payload + \\\" to endpoint: \\\" + endpoint);\\r\\n\\t\\t}\\r\\n        \\r\\n\\t\\ttry {\\r\\n\\t\\t\\t\/\/ Create and send the REST Message\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tvar sm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tsm.setEndpoint(this.endpoint);\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tsm.setHttpMethod(this.method);\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tsm.setRequestBody(encoded_payload);\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tsm.setRequestHeader(\\\"Content-Type\\\", \\\"application\/json\\\");\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tsm.setBasicAuth(gs.getProperty(\\\""+$SNOW_Webhook_Basic_User+"\\\"),gs.getProperty(\\\""+$SNOW_Webhook_Basic_Password+"\\\"));\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tvar res = sm.executeAsync();\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tvar resStatusCode = res.getStatusCode();\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tgs.info(\\\""+$SNOW_Webhook_Script_Include_Name+" got response status code: \\\" + resStatusCode);\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tif(res.haveError())\\r\\n\\t\\t\\t{\\r\\n\\t\\t\\t\\tgs.error(\\\""+ $SNOW_Webhook_Script_Include_Name+" got error code: \\\" + res.getErrorCode());\\r\\n\\t\\t\\t\\tgs.error(\\\""+ $SNOW_Webhook_Script_Include_Name+" got error message: \\\" + res.getErrorMessage());\\r\\n\\t\\t\\t}\\r\\n\\t\\t\\treturn res;\\r\\n\\t\\t}\\r\\n\\t\\tcatch (ex) {\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tvar message = ex.getMessage();\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tgs.error(\\\""+ $SNOW_Webhook_Script_Include_Name+" Resquest Error: \\\" + JSON.stringify(message));\\r\\n\\t\\t}\\r\\n    }\\r\\n};\",\"api_name\":\"global."+ $SNOW_Webhook_Script_Include_Name+"\",\"caller_access\":\"\",\"name\":\""+ $SNOW_Webhook_Script_Include_Name+"\",\"sys_name\":\""+ $SNOW_Webhook_Script_Include_Name+"\"}", 

              $BHIP_Webhook_Security_Profile_Type== "ANONYMOUS", "{\"client_callable\":\"false\",\"access\":\"public\",\"active\":\"true\",\"description\":\"Post payload object to endpoint.\",\"script\":\"var "+$SNOW_Webhook_Script_Include_Name+" = Class.create();\\r\\n \\r\\n"+$SNOW_Webhook_Script_Include_Name+".prototype = {\\r\\n    'endpoint': '',\\r\\n    'method': 'post',\\r\\n    'payload': {},\\r\\n    'type': '"+$SNOW_Webhook_Script_Include_Name+"',\\r\\n    'send': function (payload, endpoint) {\\r\\n        \/\/Set Payload and Endpoint\\r\\n        this.payload = payload;\\r\\n\\t\\tvar encoded_payload = JSON.stringify(this.payload);\\r\\n\\t\\tgs.info(\\\""+$SNOW_Webhook_Script_Include_Name+" payload \\\"+encoded_payload);\\r\\n\\t\\tthis.endpoint = endpoint;\\r\\n\\t\\tif(gs.hasRole(\\\"admin\\\")){\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tgs.debug(\\\"Sending payload \\\" + encoded_payload + \\\" to endpoint: \\\" + endpoint);\\r\\n\\t\\t}\\r\\n        \\r\\n\\t\\ttry {\\r\\n\\t\\t\\t\/\/ Create and send the REST Message\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tvar sm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tsm.setEndpoint(this.endpoint);\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tsm.setHttpMethod(this.method);\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tsm.setRequestBody(encoded_payload);\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tsm.setRequestHeader(\\\"Content-Type\\\", \\\"application\/json\\\");\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tvar res = sm.executeAsync();\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tvar resStatusCode = res.getStatusCode();\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tgs.info(\\\""+$script_include_nam+" got response status code: \\\" + resStatusCode);\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tif(res.haveError())\\r\\n\\t\\t\\t{\\r\\n\\t\\t\\t\\tgs.error(\\\""+ $SNOW_Webhook_Script_Include_Name+" got error code: \\\" + res;\\r\\n\\t\\t}\\r\\n\\t\\tcatch (ex) {\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tvar message = ex.getMessage();\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tgs.error(\\\""+ $SNOW_Webhook_Script_Include_Name+" Resquest Error: \\\" + JSON.stringify(message));\\r\\n\\t\\t}\\r\\n    }\\r\\n};\",\"api_name\":\"global."+ $SNOW_Webhook_Script_Include_Name+"\",\"caller_access\":\"\",\"name\":\""+ $SNOW_Webhook_Script_Include_Name+"\",\"sys_name\":\""+ $SNOW_Webhook_Script_Include_Name+"\"}", 

              $BHIP_Webhook_Security_Profile_Type== "APIKEY", "{\"client_callable\":\"false\",\"access\":\"public\",\"active\":\"true\",\"description\":\"Post payload object to endpoint.\",\"script\":\"var "+$SNOW_Webhook_Script_Include_Name+" = Class.create();\\r\\n \\r\\n"+$SNOW_Webhook_Script_Include_Name+".prototype = {\\r\\n    'endpoint': '',\\r\\n    'method': 'post',\\r\\n    'payload': {},\\r\\n    'type': '"+$SNOW_Webhook_Script_Include_Name+"',\\r\\n    'send': function (payload, endpoint) {\\r\\n        \/\/Set Payload and Endpoint\\r\\n        this.payload = payload;\\r\\n\\t\\tvar encoded_payload = JSON.stringify(this.payload);\\r\\n\\t\\tgs.info(\\\""+$SNOW_Webhook_Script_Include_Name+" payload \\\"+encoded_payload);\\r\\n\\t\\tthis.endpoint = endpoint;\\r\\n\\t\\tif(gs.hasRole(\\\"admin\\\")){\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tgs.debug(\\\"Sending payload \\\" + encoded_payload + \\\" to endpoint: \\\" + endpoint);\\r\\n\\t\\t}\\r\\n        \\r\\n\\t\\ttry {\\r\\n\\t\\t\\t\/\/ Create and send the REST Message\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tvar sm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tsm.setEndpoint(this.endpoint);\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tsm.setHttpMethod(this.method);\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tsm.setRequestBody(encoded_payload);\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tsm.setRequestHeader(\\\""+$BHIP_Integration_API_Security_Profile_ApiKey_Name+"\\\", gs.getProperty(\\\""+$SNOW_Webhook_APIKEY+"\\\"));\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tsm.setRequestHeader(\\\"Content-Type\\\", \\\"application\/json\\\");\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tvar res = sm.executeAsync();\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tvar resStatusCode = res.getStatusCode();\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tgs.info(\\\""+$script_include_nam+" got response status code: \\\" + resStatusCode);\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tif(res.haveError())\\r\\n\\t\\t\\t{\\r\\n\\t\\t\\t\\tgs.error(\\\""+ $SNOW_Webhook_Script_Include_Name+" got error code: \\\" + res.getErrorCode());\\r\\n\\t\\t\\t\\tgs.error(\\\""+ $SNOW_Webhook_Script_Include_Name+" got error message: \\\" + res.getErrorMessage());\\r\\n\\t\\t\\t}\\r\\n\\t\\t\\treturn res;\\r\\n\\t\\t}\\r\\n\\t\\tcatch (ex) {\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tvar message = ex.getMessage();\\r\\n\\t\\t\\tgs.error(\\\""+ $SNOW_Webhook_Script_Include_Name+" Resquest Error: \\\" + JSON.stringify(message));\\r\\n\\t\\t}\\r\\n    }\\r\\n};\",\"api_name\":\"global."+ $SNOW_Webhook_Script_Include_Name+"\",\"caller_access\":\"\",\"name\":\""+ $SNOW_Webhook_Script_Include_Name+"\",\"sys_name\":\""+ $SNOW_Webhook_Script_Include_Name+"\"}");
              
            


WriteToOperationLog("Payload for sys script:"+ script_include[2]);
$webhook_script = Array();
$webhook_script[0]=system_property;
$webhook_script[1]=business_rule;
$webhook_script[2]=script_include;
if($BHIP_Webhook_Security_Profile_Type =="BASIC",
$webhook_script[3]=system_property_AuthUser;
$webhook_script[4]=system_property_AuthPassword);

if($BHIP_Webhook_Security_Profile_Type =="APIKEY",
$webhook_script[3]=system_property_ApiKey);


while($i < Length($webhook_script),
	   	RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Check webhook artifact exist</TAG>");
      $ErrorLogs = $ErrorLogs + $jitterbit.operation.previous.error;
     // $SummaryLogs = $SummaryLogs +  "Webhook was created  successfully";
     	$i++;
);
$SummaryLogs = $SummaryLogs +  "Webhook registration  successful. Please check System property:-" + $SNOW_Webhook_Property_Name+ "  Business Rule : - " +$SNOW_Webhook_Business_Rule_Name+ "  Script Include:-" + $SNOW_Webhook_Script_Include_Name + "in ServiceNow Instance";
$jitterbit.api.response = "Webhook registered in service Now";
</trans>

components.name: SNOW  HOM Mapping
components.scriptBody:
<javascript>
var data = $homData;
$incident_id = data.incident_id;
$_operation = data._operations;
$msg = data.msg;
$_notes = data._notes;
$severity = data.severity;
$status = data.status;
$priority =data.priority;
$source_identifier = data.source_identifier;
$source_hostname = data.source_hostname;
$modified_time = data._modified_time;
$_operations = data._operations;

WriteToOperationLog("source_identifier:::::"+$source_identifier);
WriteToOperationLog("source_hostname:::::"+$source_hostname);
WriteToOperationLog("status:::::"+$status);
WriteToOperationLog("severity:::::"+$severity);


var lastOperations=$_operations.split(",");
if(lastOperations.length > 1){
	lastOperations = lastOperations.slice(Math.max(lastOperations.length - 2, 0)).join().replace(","," ").slice(0,-1);
}else{
	lastOperations = "";
}

//WriteToOperationLog(lastOperations.slice(Math.max(lastOperations.length - 2, 0)));
var lastNotes=$_notes.split(",");
WriteToOperationLog("Length of notes : "+lastNotes.length);
WriteToOperationLog("notes array : "+lastNotes);
if(lastNotes.length > 1){
	lastNotes=lastNotes.slice(Math.max(lastNotes.length - 1,0)).join().replace(","," ").slice(0,-1);
}else{
	lastNotes = "";
}

$lastOperationValue = lastOperations;
$lastNotesValue = lastNotes;
WriteToOperationLog("Notes :::::::"+$lastNotesValue);
WriteToOperationLog("Operations :::::::"+$lastOperationValue);
WriteToOperationLog("Message Or ShortDesc is here ---->"+$msg);

WriteToOperationLog("Incident Id in the payload i----.>>>>>>>"+$incident_id);
//$urgencySnow=1;
//$impactSnow=1;
switch($severity) {  //SEVERITY ---> URGENCY  FIRST TIME SNOW CREATION
case "CRITICAL":  
                                $urgencySnow = 1;  //HIGH
    $impactSnow = 1; // HIGH
    break;
case "MAJOR":
                               $urgencySnow = 2;  //MEDIUM
    break;
case "MINOR":
                               $urgencySnow = 3; //LOW
    break;
case "WARNING":
                               $urgencySnow = 3;
    break;
case "INFORMATION":
                               $urgencySnow = 3;
    break;
  }

WriteToOperationLog("Urgency Snow is::::::"+$urgencySnow); 
 //WriteToOperationLog("impactSnow Snow is::::::"+$impactSnow); 
 
 switch($status) { //STATUS----> STATE
case "OPEN":
                                $stateSnow = 1; // New
    break;
case "CLOSED":
                               $stateSnow = 7; //Close
    break;
case "ACK":
                               $stateSnow = 2; 
    break;
case "ASSIGNED":
                               $stateSnow = 2; //In progress
    break;
  }


switch($priority) { //PRIORITY----IMPACT
case "PRIORITY_1":  // HIGHEST 
                                $impactSnow = 1; // HIGH
    break;
case "PRIORITY_2":  // HIGH 
                                $impactSnow = 1; // HIGH
    break;


case "PRIORITY_3":
                               $impactSnow = 2; //MEDIUM
    break;

case "PRIORITY_4":
                               $impactSnow = 2; //MEDIUM
    break;


case "PRIORITY_5":
                               $impactSnow = 3; //LOW
    break;

  }
WriteToOperationLog("Impact Snow is::::::"+$impactSnow); 



if($incident_id == "")
{
                $actionType = "create";
}
else{

                $actionType = "update";
}



$BHOM_msg = data.msg;;
$BHOM_tenant_id = data._tenant_id;
$BHOM_creation_time = data.creation_time;
$BHOM_severity_ordinal = data.severity_ordinal;
$BHOM_sub_category= data.sub_category;
$BHOM_modelname = data.sub_category
$BHOM_source_identifier = data.source_identifier;
$BHOM_tenant_name = data._tenant_name;
$BHOM_errors = data._errors;
$BHOM_incident_id= data.incident_id;
$BHOM_service_id= data._service_id;
$BHOM_ci_id = data._ci_id;
$BHOM_operations= data._operations;
$BHOM_incident_company = data.incident_company;
$BHOM_source_port = data.source_port;
$BHOM_source_address = data.source_address;
$BHOM_alias = data.alias;
$BHOM_details = data.details;
$BHOM_modified_time = data._modified_time;
$BHOM_notes = data._notes;
$BHOM_class = data.class;
$BHOM_lifecycle_time = data._lifecycle_time;
$BHOM_severity = $urgencySnow;
$BHOM_arrival_time = data._arrival_time;
$BHOM_priority_ordinal = data.priority_ordinal;
$BHOM_cdmclass = data.cdmclass;
$BHOM_priority = $impactSnow;
$BHOM_node_service_mapping = data._node_service_mapping;
$BHOM_node_id = data._node_id;
$BHOM_unmapped_data = data._unmapped_data;
$BHOM_identifier = data._identifier;
$BHOM_tags = data.tags;
$BHOM_sub_category_ordinal = data.sub_category_ordinal
$BHOM_category = data.category;
$BHOM_source_hostname = data.source_hostname;
$BHOM_status = $stateSnow;
$BHOM_type = data.type

</javascript>

  $successCount = CountSourceRecords();
  ,
  $errorLogs += "\n Failed to Update status In Service Now for Incident: "+$incident_id+" \n";
  $failureCount = CountSourceRecords();
  );

</trans>

components.name: Custom API Creation Payload
components.scriptBody:
<javascript>
function createGuid() {  
   function s4() {  
      return Math.floor((1 + Math.random()) * 0x10000).toString(16).substring(1);  
   }  
   return s4() + s4() + '-' + s4() + '-' + s4() + '-' + s4() + '-' + s4() + s4() + s4();  
}  


fullAuthProfilePayload=JSON.parse($fullAuthProfilePayload);
apiUsers = JSON.parse($apiRoleList);
WriteToOperationLog("USERS LIST");
WriteToOperationLog($apiRoleList);
WriteToOperationLog(apiUsers);


//WriteToOperationLog("............... Inside Create API Payload Script ...........");
apiId=createGuid();
operationGuid=createGuid();
cors="\"enableCors\":false";
debug="\"debugUntilDate\":" + (Date.now()+(60*60000))
operations="\"operations\":[{\"operationId\":\""+$operationId+"\",\"responseType\":\""+$BHIP_Integration_API_Response_Type+"\",\"id\":\""+operationGuid+"\",\"requestMethod\": \""+($BHIP_Integration_API_Method).toUpperCase()+"\"}]";
serviceRoot="\"serviceRoot\": \""+$BHIP_Integration_API_Name.replace(" ", "")+"\"";

profiles="\"profiles\": ["
fullAuthProfilePayload.forEach(function(eachProfile){
	profileGuid=createGuid();
	profiles=profiles+"{\"id\":\""+profileGuid+"\",\"profileId\":\""+eachProfile.id+"\"},";

});
profiles=profiles.substring(0,profiles.length -1) + "]";
name="\"name\": \""+$BHIP_Integration_API_Name+"\"";
serviceType="\"serviceType\": \"CUSTOM_API\"";
ssl="\"useSslOnly\": true";
organizationId="\"organizationId\": \""+$orgId+"\"";
enviromentId="\"environmentId\": \""+$envId+"\"";
verbose="\"enableVerbose\": false";
id="\"id\": \""+apiId+"\"";
timeout="\"timeoutSeconds\": \""+$BHIP_API_TimeOut+"\"";
userRoles = "\"userRoles\":[";
inputUserRoles= $BHIP_API_User_Roles;
userRolesTemp = inputUserRoles.split(",");
userRolesTemp.forEach(function(eachInput){
	//WriteToOperationLog("Each Input : "+eachInput)
	apiUsers.forEach(function(eachUser){
  //WriteToOperationLog("Each user : "+eachUser["roleName"])
  	if (eachUser["roleName"] == eachInput){
    	userRoles = userRoles + JSON.stringify(eachUser) + ","
    }
  });

});
//WriteToOperationLog("Userroles : "+userRoles)
if (userRoles.endsWith(",")){
	userRoles = userRoles.substring(0,userRoles.length -1)
}
userRoles = userRoles + "]";

payload="{"+cors+","+debug+","+operations+","+serviceRoot+"," + userRoles + ","+profiles+","+name+","+serviceType+","+ssl+","+organizationId+","+enviromentId+","+verbose+","+id+","+timeout+"}";
WriteToOperationLog("Payload for Api creation "+payload);
$jt=payload;
</javascript>

components.name: Parse & Driver Script
components.scriptBody:
<trans>
RunScript("<TAG>script:Parse Webhook Payload</TAG>");
RunScript("<TAG>script:Hex Timestamp Conversion</TAG>");
//WriteToOperationLog($json);
//WriteToOperationLog($SnowRequestjson);
$incidentInSNOW = $SnowRequestjson["number"]["value"];
WriteToOperationLog("Incident number in SNOW Json payload: "+$incidentInSNOW);
$correlation_id = $SnowRequestjson["correlation_id"]["value"];

WriteToOperationLog("correlation_id in SNOW Json payload: "+$correlation_id);
$sys_id =  $SnowRequestjson["sys_id"]["value"];
WriteToOperationLog("Sys id in SNOW Json payload: "+$sys_id);
caller_id  = $SnowRequestjson["caller_id"]["display_value"];
arr = Split(caller_id, " ");
$caller_first_name = arr[0];
$caller_last_name = arr[1];
$urgency = $SnowRequestjson["urgency"]["value"];
$severity = Case($urgency == '1', 'CRITICAL' ,
  $urgency == '2', 'MAJOR'  ,
  $urgency == '3', 'MINOR' );
//$severity = $SnowRequestjson["severity"]["display_value"];
WriteToOperationLog("severity: "+$severity);
$work_notes = Split($SnowRequestjson["comments_and_work_notes"]["display_value"],"\n")[1];
//WriteToOperationLog("work_notes: "+$work_notes);
$status= $SnowRequestjson["incident_state"]["display_value"];

$homStatusfromSnow='UNKNOWN';
if($status == "In Progress",
 $homStatusfromSnow = "ACK");


if($status == "Work in progress",
 $homStatusfromSnow = "ACK");

if($status=="Closed",
$homStatusfromSnow = "CLOSED");

if($status=="Resolved",
$homStatusfromSnow = "CLOSED"); 

if($status == "New",
 $homStatusfromSnow = "OPEN");
 
if($status == "Assigned",
 $homStatusfromSnow = "ACK");
 
if($status == "Acknowledged",
 $homStatusfromSnow = "ACK");
 
if($status == "Suspended",
 $homStatusfromSnow = "ACK"); 

$eventId = $correlation_id;
operStatus=RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Get Event Details</TAG>");
WriteToOperationLog("Existing Notes in BHOM :" +$eventNotes);
WriteToOperationLog("Current Event "+ $correlation_id+ " status : "+$eventStatus);

WriteToOperationLog("******************************************************************");
WriteToOperationLog("Event Status in BHOM :"+$eventStatus +" Status trying to set from SNOW :"+$homStatusfromSnow);
WriteToOperationLog($homStatusfromSnow =='UNKNOWN' || $homStatusfromSnow == $eventStatus || $eventStatus == 'CLOSED');
WriteToOperationLog("Event Sev is BHOM :"+$eventSeverity +" Severity trying to set from SNOW :"+$severity);
WriteToOperationLog($eventSeverity == $severity);
WriteToOperationLog(($homStatusfromSnow =='UNKNOWN' || $homStatusfromSnow == $eventStatus || $eventStatus == 'CLOSED') && $eventSeverity == $severity );
WriteToOperationLog("******************************************************************");
$statusSync="true";
if(($homStatusfromSnow =='UNKNOWN' || $homStatusfromSnow == $eventStatus || $eventStatus == 'CLOSED')  && $eventSeverity == $severity   ,
	$statusSync = "false"
);


//if(!IsNull($status),$status=ToUpper($status));

WriteToOperationLog("incident_state ($homStatusFromSnow): "+$homStatusfromSnow);
WriteToOperationLog("Status sync needed :"+$statusSync);
$closed_by = $SnowRequestjson["closed_by"]["display_value"];
WriteToOperationLog("closed_by: "+$closed_by);
$resolved_by = $SnowRequestjson["resolved_by"]["display_value"];
WriteToOperationLog("resolved_by: "+$resolved_by);
$short_description = $SnowRequestjson["short_description"]["display_value"];
WriteToOperationLog("short_description: "+$short_description);
$comments_and_work_notes = $SnowRequestjson["comments_and_work_notes"]["display_value"];
WriteToOperationLog("comments_and_work_notes: "+$comments_and_work_notes);

closeCode = $SnowRequestjson["close_code"]["display_value"];
WriteToOperationLog("close_code: "+closeCode);
closeNotes = $SnowRequestjson["close_notes"]["display_value"];
WriteToOperationLog("close_notes: "+closeNotes);

RunScript("<TAG>script:SNOWLoopingCheck</TAG>");
WriteToOperationLog("IS update by hom : "+ $isUpdatedByHOM);
If($isUpdatedByHOM=='false' || $statusSync=='true',
	WriteToOperationLog("Entering false mode");

if(!IsNull(closeCode) && closeCode != "" && !IsNull(closeNotes) && closeNotes != "",
	$note = closeNotes);  // CREATING NOTES FOR CLOSE STATUS BY GIVING RESOLUTION CODE AND RESOLUTION NOTE
//$note = "[{\"close_code\": \""+ closeCode  +"\"}{\"close_notes\": \""+ closeNotes +"\"}]");
	WriteToOperationLog("closing note: "+$note);

If(!IsNull($correlation_id) && $statusSync == "true",
		
   Sleep(3);
   	WriteToOperationLog("Update incident close status in HOM");
  	RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Update incident status in HOM</TAG>"));
  
If(!IsNull($correlation_id) && (!IsNull($work_notes) && $work_notes != "") && $isUpdatedByHOM=='false',
		$work_notes= $snowHomCommentPrefix+ ": " + $work_notes;
		
   	WriteToOperationLog("Update incident notes in HOM");
    RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Add Notes</TAG>");
    //RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Update incident notes in HOM</TAG>"); 
    );
 	,WriteToOperationLog("Exiting from updating");
);
</trans>

WriteToOperationLog($homStatusfromSnow =='UNKNOWN' || $homStatusfromSnow == $eventStatus || $eventStatus == 'CLOSED');
WriteToOperationLog("Event Sev is BHOM :"+$eventSeverity +" Severity trying to set from SNOW :"+$severity);
WriteToOperationLog($eventSeverity == $severity);
WriteToOperationLog(($homStatusfromSnow =='UNKNOWN' || $homStatusfromSnow == $eventStatus || $eventStatus == 'CLOSED') && $eventSeverity == $severity );
WriteToOperationLog("******************************************************************");
$statusSync="true";
if(($homStatusfromSnow =='UNKNOWN' || $homStatusfromSnow == $eventStatus || $eventStatus == 'CLOSED')  && $eventSeverity == $severity   ,
	$statusSync = "false"
);




WriteToOperationLog("incident_state ($homStatusFromSnow): "+$homStatusfromSnow);
WriteToOperationLog("Status sync needed :"+$statusSync);
$closed_by = $SnowRequestjson["closed_by"]["display_value"];
WriteToOperationLog("closed_by: "+$closed_by);
$resolved_by = $SnowRequestjson["resolved_by"]["display_value"];
WriteToOperationLog("resolved_by: "+$resolved_by);
$short_description = $SnowRequestjson["short_description"]["display_value"];
WriteToOperationLog("short_description: "+$short_description);
$comments_and_work_notes = $SnowRequestjson["comments_and_work_notes"]["display_value"];
WriteToOperationLog("comments_and_work_notes: "+$comments_and_work_notes);

closeCode = $SnowRequestjson["close_code"]["display_value"];
WriteToOperationLog("close_code: "+closeCode);
closeNotes = $SnowRequestjson["close_notes"]["display_value"];
WriteToOperationLog("close_notes: "+closeNotes);

RunScript("<TAG>script:SNOWLoopingCheck</TAG>");
WriteToOperationLog("IS update by hom : "+ $isUpdatedByHOM);
If($isUpdatedByHOM=='false' || $statusSync=='true',
	WriteToOperationLog("Entering false mode");

if(!IsNull(closeCode) && closeCode != "" && !IsNull(closeNotes) && closeNotes != "",
	$note = closeNotes);  

	WriteToOperationLog("closing note: "+$note);

If(!IsNull($correlation_id) && $statusSync == "true",
		
   Sleep(3);
   	WriteToOperationLog("Update incident close status in HOM");
  	RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Update incident status in HOM</TAG>"));
  
If(!IsNull($correlation_id) && (!IsNull($work_notes) && $work_notes != "") && $isUpdatedByHOM=='false',
		$work_notes= $snowHomCommentPrefix+ ": " + $work_notes;
		
   	WriteToOperationLog("Update incident notes in HOM");
    RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Add Notes</TAG>");
    
    );
 	,WriteToOperationLog("Exiting from updating");
);
</trans>

components.name: Create single API in Jitterbit
components.scriptBody:
<trans>
allProfiles=Split($BHIP_Integration_API_Security_Profile_Type, ",");
if(CountSubString($BHIP_Integration_API_Security_Profile_Type,"OAUTH") > 0,
	RaiseError("OAUTH Security profile was not supported, Please chose BASIC/ANONYMOUS/APIKEY");
 );

/// Jitter bit Login 
WriteToOperationLog(".............. Driver Script : ....... Do Jitterbit Login *****************");
$path="/identity/api/v1/users/login";
RunScript("<TAG>script:Create Login Payload</TAG>");
RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Login into Jitterbit</TAG>");
RunScript("<TAG>script:Validate HTTP Status Code</TAG>");
/**
statusCode=Get("jitterbit.target.http.status_code");
if(statusCode != "201",
	error=$jitterbit.operation.previous.error;
  error = error+"\n"+ $jt;
  RaiseError("Failed to login to jitterbit "+error)
  );
**/  
  
WriteToOperationLog(".............. Driver Script : ....... Jitter bit Login Successful ");
$jwt_token=Get("jitterbit.target.http.response.header.x-jitterbit-authorizationtoken");
//WriteToOperationLog(".............. Driver Script : ....... Fetched auth token and set as global var");
WriteToOperationLog("---------------------------------------------");



// Fetch Operation ID 
WriteToOperationLog(".............. Driver Script : .......  Get Operation ID ***************************");
$path="api-manager/api/v1/projects/environments/"+$envId;
RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Check Custom API and Security Profiles exist</TAG>");
RunScript("<TAG>script:Validate HTTP Status Code</TAG>");
/**
statusCode=Get("jitterbit.target.http.status_code");
    if(statusCode != "200",
      error=$jitterbit.operation.previous.error;
      error = error+"\n"+ $jt;
      RaiseError("Failed to fetch projects "+error)
    );
 **/   
$operationResp=$jt;
RunScript("<TAG>script:Get Operation Id</TAG>");
if($operationId=="",
RaiseError("Failed to get the operation. Please give valid operation name inside the current environment");
);
WriteToOperationLog(".............. Driver Script : .......  Got the Operation ID ***************************");

/// Check Api Exists
//WriteToOperationLog(".............. Driver Script : .......  Get Api List ************************");
$path="api-manager/api/v1/api-definitions/organizations/"+$orgId;
RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Check Custom API and Security Profiles exist</TAG>");
RunScript("<TAG>script:Validate HTTP Status Code</TAG>");
/**
statusCode=Get("jitterbit.target.http.status_code");
if(statusCode != "200",
	error=$jitterbit.operation.previous.error;
  error = error+"\n"+ $jt;
  RaiseError("Failed to Fetch API List "+error)
  );
  **/
$apiList=$jt;
WriteToOperationLog(".............. Driver Script : ....... List of created api's :"+$apiList);
RunScript("<TAG>script:Check API Exists</TAG>");
//RunScript("<TAG>script:Check API Exists</TAG>");
// Delete the api if exists
WriteToOperationLog("Is api exists to delete ? "+$apiExists);
//WriteToOperationLog("api to delete  "+$apiId);
if($apiExists=="true",
	$path="api-manager/api/v1/api-definitions/"+$apiId;
  $jt="";
	RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Delete API and Security Profile if needed</TAG>");
	RunScript("<TAG>script:Validate HTTP Status Code</TAG>");
  /**
  statusCode=Get("jitterbit.target.http.status_code");
	if(statusCode != "200",
		error=$jitterbit.operation.previous.error;
  	error = error+"\n"+ $jt;
  	RaiseError("Cant able to delete the API : "+error)
  );
  **/
);


// get API user Roles
$path="/api-manager/api/v1/api-definitions/getApiUserRoles/"+$orgId;
RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Check Custom API and Security Profiles exist</TAG>");
RunScript("<TAG>script:Validate HTTP Status Code</TAG>");
/**
statusCode=Get("jitterbit.target.http.status_code");
if(statusCode != "200",
	error=$jitterbit.operation.previous.error;
  error = error+"\n"+ $jt;
  RaiseError("Failed to Fetch Auth profile List "+error)
  );
  **/
$apiRoleList=$jt;


// check AuthProfile exists
//WriteToOperationLog(".............. Driver Script : .......  Get Auth Profile List ************************");
$path="api-manager/api/v1/auth-profiles/organizations/"+$orgId;
RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Check Custom API and Security Profiles exist</TAG>");

RunScript("<TAG>script:Validate HTTP Status Code</TAG>");
/**
statusCode=Get("jitterbit.target.http.status_code");
if(statusCode != "200",
	error=$jitterbit.operation.previous.error;
  error = error+"\n"+ $jt;
  RaiseError("Failed to Fetch Auth profile List "+error)
  );
  **/
$authProfileList=$jt;
//WriteToOperationLog(".............. Driver Script : ....... List of authentication profiles :"+$authProfileList);

profileTypes=$BHIP_Integration_API_Security_Profile_Type;
listOfProfileTypes=Split(profileTypes, ",");
i=0;
fullAuthProfilePayload="[";
While(i < Length(listOfProfileTypes), 
	$currentProfileType=Get(listOfProfileTypes,i);
  if($currentProfileType!="OAUTH",
  	$currentProfileName=Get(listOfProfileTypes,i)+"-"+$BHIP_Integration_API_Security_Profile_Name_Suffix;
	RunScript("<TAG>script:Get Auth Profile Id if Exists</TAG>");
 	//WriteToOperationLog(".............. Driver Script : .......Current Auth profile id is  :"+$currAuthProfId);
  	if($currAuthProfId !=0,
  		//WriteToOperationLog(".............. Driver Script : .......inside auth profile deletion code");
  		$jt="";
  		$path="api-manager/api/v1/auth-profiles/"+$currAuthProfId;
    	RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Delete API and Security Profile if needed</TAG>");
  		RunScript("<TAG>script:Validate HTTP Status Code</TAG>");
      /**
      statusCode=Get("jitterbit.target.http.status_code");
    		if(statusCode != "200",
      		error=$jitterbit.operation.previous.error;
     			error = error+"\n"+ $jt;
			RaiseError("Failed to delete Auth profile : "+  $currentProfileName + " \n" +error);
    		);
        **/
    
  	);
	RunScript("<TAG>script:Create Payload for Security Profile</TAG>");
  	$path="api-manager/api/v1/auth-profiles";
  	RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Create Security Profiles and Custom API</TAG>");
  	RunScript("<TAG>script:Validate HTTP Status Code</TAG>");
    /**
    statusCode=Get("jitterbit.target.http.status_code");
    	if(statusCode != "200",
     		error=$jitterbit.operation.previous.error;
      		error = error+"\n"+ $jt;
      		RaiseError("Failed to Create Auth profile " +  $currentProfileName + " \n"+error)
    	);
      **/
    	
    	$authProfileResp=$jt;
      fullAuthProfilePayload=fullAuthProfilePayload+$authProfileResp+ ",";
      //WriteToOperationLog("Repsonse of auth profile creation " + $auth_profile_resp);
     ); 
    
  i++;
 );
$fullAuthProfilePayload=RTrimChars(fullAuthProfilePayload,",")+"]";

//WriteToOperationLog(".............. Driver Script : .......Full Auth profile payload is  :"+$fullAuthProfilePayload);
WriteToOperationLog(".............. Driver Script : .......Auth Profile Created");

// Create API and Publish it

	RunScript("<TAG>script:Custom API Creation Payload</TAG>");
  WriteToOperationLog(".............. Driver Script : .......  API Paylaod created ***************************");
  $path="api-manager/api/v1/api-definitions";
  WriteToOperationLog("Api creation payload before creating : "+ $jt);
  RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Create Security Profiles and Custom API</TAG>");
	RunScript("<TAG>script:Validate HTTP Status Code</TAG>");
  /**
  statusCode=Get("jitterbit.target.http.status_code");
    if(statusCode != "200",
      error=$jitterbit.operation.previous.error;
      error = error+"\n"+ $jt;
      RaiseError("Failed to Create API "+error)
    );
    **/
  	$apiResp=$jt;
    //WriteToOperationLog("Api Resp : "+$apiResp);
    WriteToOperationLog(".............. Driver Script : .......  API Created ***************************");

 		RunScript("<TAG>script:Fetch API ID for Publish</TAG>");
    $path="api-manager/api/v1/api-definitions/"+$apiId+"/publish";
    RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Publish Custom API</TAG>");
		RunScript("<TAG>script:Validate HTTP Status Code</TAG>");
    /**
    statusCode=Get("jitterbit.target.http.status_code");
    if(statusCode != "200",
      error=$jitterbit.operation.previous.error;
      error = error+"\n"+ $jt;
      RaiseError("Failed to Publish API "+error)
    );
    **/
    $publishResp=$jt;
    WriteToOperationLog(".............. Driver Script : ....... Published the API ***************************");

	//$path="api-manager/api/v1/auth-profiles/oauth/organizations/"+$orgId;
	//RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Check Custom API and Security Profiles exist</TAG>");
	//$outhResp=$jt;

  RunScript("<TAG>script:Verify the API Publish All Global Variable</TAG>");
  $api_url = $apiUrl;
  WriteToOperationLog("Api Url :"+$api_url);
  WriteToOperationLog("Webhook Action :"+$BHIP_Hom_Webhook_Action);
  WriteToOperationLog("API Username :"+$BHIP_Integration_API_Security_Profile_BASIC_Auth_Username);
  WriteToOperationLog("API password :"+$BHIP_Integration_API_Security_Profile_BASIC_Auth_Password);
  WriteToOperationLog("Published the api");
</trans>

components.name: Set Values
components.scriptBody:
<trans>
WriteToOperationLog($createServiceNowResponse);
$jsonObj = $createServiceNowResponse;
RunScript("<TAG>script:Parse JSON</TAG>");
WriteToOperationLog($jitterbit.source.http.status_code);
if($jitterbit.source.http.status_code != 200,
	
	$failureCount = CountSourceRecords();
  RaiseError($jitterbit.source.http.response);
  ,
  $successCount = CountSourceRecords(); 

  //WriteToOperationLog("After Parsing : "+$jsonObj);
  $queriedIncidentNumber = $jsonObj["result"]["number"];
  $queriedSysId = $jsonObj["result"]["sys_id"];
  $queriedUrgency = $jsonObj["result"]["urgency"];
  $queriedCorrelationId = $jsonObj["result"]["correlation_id"];
  $short_descriptionBackToHOM=$jsonObj["result"]["short_description"];
  $incidentnumberBackToHOM=$queriedIncidentNumber;
  $sysIdSnow=$jsonObj["result"]["sys_id"];
  $correlationBackToHom=$jsonObj["result"]["correlation_id"];
  WriteToOperationLog("Incident number to be updated : "+$incidentnumberBackToHOM)
);

</trans>

components.name: CI database Variables
components.scriptBody:
<trans>
WriteToOperationLog($createServiceNowResponse);
$jsonObj = $createServiceNowResponse;
RunScript("<TAG>script:Parse JSON</TAG>");
WriteToOperationLog("Count of results after querying : "+Count($jsonObj['result']));
if(Count($jsonObj['result']) > 0,
$BHOM_ci_id=$jsonObj['result'][0]['sys_id'];
$BHOM_location=$jsonObj['result'][0]['category'];
$BHOM_modelname=$jsonObj['result'][0]['subcategory'];
$BHOM_install_status=$jsonObj['result'][0]['install_status'];
$BHOM_name=$jsonObj['result'][0]['name']
,
// If there is no record for Correlation id
$BHOM_ci_id='';
$BHOM_location='';
$BHOM_modelname='';
$BHOM_install_status='';
$BHOM_name=''

);

</trans>

components.name: Debug & validate
components.scriptBody:
<trans>
//WriteToOperationLog("HOMResponse : "+ $HOMResponse);
WriteToOperationLog("final closing status : "+ $closeStatus);
//WriteToOperationLog("operations : "+ $operations);
WriteToOperationLog("notes : "+ $noteDetails);
WriteToOperationLog("current worknote : "+ $work_notes);
allNotes = $noteDetails;
currentNote = $work_notes;
WriteToOperationLog("lenght noteDetails :  "+ StringLength($noteDetails));
WriteToOperationLog("lenght worknote :  "+ StringLength($work_notes));
validMsg = 'false';
If(!IsNull($correlation_id) && $status == "CLOSED",
		if($closeStatus == "CLOSED",
   		WriteToOperationLog("Close operation success.");
      validMsg = 'true';
      $EmailSubject = "SERVICE NOW -> HOM Projects status close";
      $EmailMessage = "Success: HOM Event closed successfully. HOM Event ID: "+$correlation_id+" Servicenow Incident ID: "+$incidentInSNOW;,
      WriteToOperationLog("Close operation failed!");
      validMsg = 'true';
      $EmailSubject = "SERVICE NOW -> HOM Projects status close";
      $EmailMessage = "Failure: HOM Event failed to close. HOM Event ID: "+$correlation_id+" Servicenow Incident ID: "+$incidentInSNOW;));

If(!IsNull($correlation_id) && $status == "NEW" && !IsNull($work_notes) && $work_notes != "",
		if((Index($noteDetails,$work_notes) != -1),
   		WriteToOperationLog("Update incident notes in HOM done successfully.");
      validMsg = 'true';
      $EmailSubject = "SERVICE NOW -> HOM Projects notes update";
      $EmailMessage = "Success: HOM Event notes updated successfully. HOM Event ID: "+$correlation_id+" Servicenow Incident ID: "+$incidentInSNOW;,
    	WriteToOperationLog("Update notes operation failed!");
      validMsg = 'true';
      $EmailSubject = "SERVICE NOW -> HOM Projects notes update";
      $EmailMessage = "Failure: HOM Event notes updation failed. HOM Event ID: "+$correlation_id+" Servicenow Incident ID: "+$incidentInSNOW;));


WriteToOperationLog("about to send sync result email.");
If($Email_Sync_Result == 'true' && validMsg == 'true',
RunScript("<TAG>script:Setup Email Notification</TAG>");
emailSyncMessage =  SendEmailMessage("<TAG>email:Sync Notification</TAG>");
WriteToOperationLog("this is from Email_Sync_Result = true;" + emailSyncMessage);
If(Bool(Length(emailSyncMessage)),
  WriteToOperationLog("Failed to send email. Error message: " + emailSyncMessage);
  );
);


</trans>

components.name: Validate and create Snow Update Payload
components.scriptBody:
<javascript>
	// this jsonobj comes from the operation call Query incident id
  WriteToOperationLog("Inside the Validate and snow update payload");
 	
  var incomingHomStatus = $stateSnow;
  $statecheck = incomingHomStatus;
  WriteToOperationLog("incoming HOM Status " + $statecheck);
  var incomingHomSeverity = $urgencySnow;
  var incomingHomNotes = $lastNotesValue;
  var incomingHomOperations = $lastOperationValue;
  var incomingHomPriority =  $impactSnow;
  WriteToOperationLog("Incoming HOM Operations : "+incomingHomOperations);
  
  var payload = {}
  var finalWorkNotes=""
  if($queriedSnowTktStatus != incomingHomStatus && $queriedSnowTktStatus != 7 ){
  	WriteToOperationLog("In if condition for status not equal 7");
    payload["incident_state"] = incomingHomStatus;
    //finalWorkNotes = finalWorkNotes+ incomingHomOperations+"\n";
    if (incomingHomStatus == 7){
    	payload["close_code"] = "Closed/Resolved by Caller"
      payload["close_notes"] = $homSnowCommentPrefix + ":" +incomingHomOperations
    }
    if($queriedSnowTktStatus == 11){
   	 payload ={}
    }
    
  }else{
  WriteToOperationLog("In the else loop");
  	if($querySnowWorkNotes.search(incomingHomNotes) == -1 ){
  	    finalWorkNotes = finalWorkNotes+incomingHomNotes+"\n";
   	
  }
  
  }
  
  //if ($queriedSnowImpact != incomingHomPriority){
  	//payload["impact"] = incomingHomPriority;
  
  //}
  
  //if($queriedSnowUrgency != incomingHomSeverity){
  //	payload["urgency"] = incomingHomSeverity;
    
    
  //}
  
  
  
  WriteToOperationLog("Final Work Notes 2 : "+finalWorkNotes);
  WriteToOperationLog("Incoming Notes : "+incomingHomNotes)
  WriteToOperationLog(incomingHomNotes.search($snowHomCommentPrefix));
  WriteToOperationLog("Query Snow Notes .."+$querySnowWorkNotes);
  if(finalWorkNotes != "" && incomingHomNotes.search($snowHomCommentPrefix) != 0 && $querySnowWorkNotes != "Updated by HOM :"){
  	payload["work_notes"] = $homSnowCommentPrefix+ " : " +finalWorkNotes
  }
  $snowUpdatePayload = JSON.stringify(payload);
  WriteToOperationLog($snowUpdatePayload);

</javascript>

components.name: Set Api Response Code

<javascript>
searchText = "HTTP protocol error."

beginIndex= $errorLogs.indexOf(searchText)
endIndex= beginIndex+4+searchText.length
WriteToOperationLog("BeginIndex "+beginIndex);
WriteToOperationLog("endIndex "+endIndex);

if(beginIndex != -1){
  $apiResponseStatus = $errorLogs.substring(beginIndex+searchText.length,endIndex).trim(); 
} else {
     $apiResponseStatus = 400
}

WriteToOperationLog("Status : "+$apiResponseStatus)

</javascript>

components.name: SNOWLoopingCheck
components.scriptBody:
<javascript>
//sys_time = Date.now();
WriteToOperationLog(Date.parse($SnowRequestjson['sys_updated_on']['display_value']));
WriteToOperationLog("Tkt Last update time : "+$SnowRequestjson['sys_updated_on']['display_value'])
var snow_tkt_upd_time = Date.parse($SnowRequestjson['sys_updated_on']['display_value']);
var comments = $SnowRequestjson['comments_and_work_notes']['display_value'].split('\n')[1];
var temp_comments_time = $SnowRequestjson['comments_and_work_notes']['display_value'].split('\n')[0].split(" ");
var comments_time = temp_comments_time[0] +" "+temp_comments_time[1];

WriteToOperationLog("Last Comment Time : "+comments_time);
WriteToOperationLog("Last Comment : "+comments);
var last_updated_comments_time = Date.parse(comments_time);

WriteToOperationLog("Last comment parse time : "+last_updated_comments_time);
WriteToOperationLog("Snow Tkt last Update time : "+snow_tkt_upd_time);

var timeStampDiff = (snow_tkt_upd_time - last_updated_comments_time) / 1000;

WriteToOperationLog("Time Difference in secs : "+ timeStampDiff);
Jitterbit.SetVar("isUpdatedByHOM",'true');
WriteToOperationLog("Comments found : "+comments.search($homSnowCommentPrefix));
WriteToOperationLog("existing Comments found : "+$eventNotes.search(comments));

WriteToOperationLog("Condition evaluation : "+comments.search($homSnowCommentPrefix) == 0 || $eventNotes.search(comments) != -1);
if (comments.search($homSnowCommentPrefix) == 0 || $eventNotes.search(comments) != -1){
	Jitterbit.SetVar("isUpdatedByHOM",'true');
  WriteToOperationLog("Updated by HOM, exit from processing");
}else {
	Jitterbit.SetVar("isUpdatedByHOM",'false');
	WriteToOperationLog("Not updated by HOm , go out ");
}

</javascript>

mappingRules.transformScript:
<trans>

$eventStatus=getEventResponse$status$;
$eventPriority=getEventResponse$priority$;
$eventSeverity=getEventResponse$severity$;
$eventNotes=getEventResponse$_notes$;


/**
//JavaScript parse
WriteToOperationLog("Operation Ation type is---->>>>>>"+$actionType);
WriteToOperationLog("Corelation id in snow is::"+$eventId);

// RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Query Incident Number</TAG>");
//
// RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Update Service Now</TAG>");
// );

$correlationIdPresentOrNot = getEventResponse$_identifier$;
homNotes = getEventResponse$_notes$;
WriteToOperationLog("Notes From HOM get event : "+homNotes);
**/

</trans>

components.name: Error Notification
components.scriptBody:
<trans>
$errorLogs=$jitterbit.operation.previous.error;
WriteToOperationLog("**********************************");
WriteToOperationLog("Inside Error notification script ");
WriteToOperationLog("previous error"+ $jitterbit.operation.previous.error);
WriteToOperationLog("-----------------------------------");
WriteToOperationLog("error"+ $jitterbit.operation.error);
WriteToOperationLog("-----------------------------------");
WriteToOperationLog("last error"+ $jitterbit.operation.last_error);
WriteToOperationLog("**********************************");
WriteToOperationLog("Setting error logs : "+$errorLogs);
If($BHIP_Email_Enabled,
    RunScript("<TAG>script:Setup Email Notification</TAG>");
    emailErrorMessage =  SendEmailMessage("<TAG>email:Error Notification</TAG>");
    If(Bool(Length(emailErrorMessage)),    
        WriteToOperationLog("Failed to send email. Error message: " + emailErrorMessage),
        WriteToOperationLog("Email notifcation sent successfully");            
    );
);
</trans>
components.scriptBodyCleansed:
<trans>
$errorLogs=$jitterbit.operation.previous.error;
WriteToOperationLog("**********************************");
WriteToOperationLog("Inside Error notification script ");
WriteToOperationLog("previous error"+ $jitterbit.operation.previous.error);
WriteToOperationLog("-----------------------------------");
WriteToOperationLog("error"+ $jitterbit.operation.error);
WriteToOperationLog("-----------------------------------");
WriteToOperationLog("last error"+ $jitterbit.operation.last_error);
WriteToOperationLog("**********************************");
WriteToOperationLog("Setting error logs : "+$errorLogs);
If($BHIP_Email_Enabled,
    RunScript("<TAG>script:Setup Email Notification</TAG>");
    emailErrorMessage =  SendEmailMessage("<TAG>email:Error Notification</TAG>");
    If(Bool(Length(emailErrorMessage)),    
        WriteToOperationLog("Failed to send email. Error message: " + emailErrorMessage),
        WriteToOperationLog("Email notifcation sent successfully");            
    );
);
</trans>

components.name: Prepare inputs for webhook artifact
components.scriptBody:
<trans>
webhook_recipe_current = $webhook_script[$i];

$webhook_table = webhook_recipe_current[0];
$webhook_name = URLEncode(webhook_recipe_current[1]);
$webhook_payload = webhook_recipe_current[2];

WriteToOperationLog("webhook table from array" + $webhook_table );
WriteToOperationLog("webhook name from array" + $webhook_name );
WriteToOperationLog("webhook payload from array" + $webhook_payload );
</trans>
components.scriptBodyCleansed:
<trans>
webhook_recipe_current = $webhook_script[$i];

$webhook_table = webhook_recipe_current[0];
$webhook_name = URLEncode(webhook_recipe_current[1]);

components.name: Create Payload for Security Profile
components.scriptBody:
<javascript>
function createGuid() {  
   function s4() {  
      return Math.floor((1 + Math.random()) * 0x10000).toString(16).substring(1);  
   }  
   return s4() + s4() + '-' + s4() + '-' + s4() + '-' + s4() + '-' + s4() + s4() + s4();  
}  

profileType=$currentProfileType
profileName=$currentProfileName

environmentId="\"environmentId\": \""+$envId+"\"";
profileObj=""

if (profileType.toUpperCase()=="ANONYMOUS"){
	profileObj= "\"name\": \""+profileName+"\",\"profileType\": \"ANONYMOUS\"";
}
if (profileType.toUpperCase()=="APIKEY"){
	apiKeyValue = createGuid()
  apiProfileKey=$BHIP_Integration_API_Security_Profile_ApiKey_Name
	profileObj= "\"name\": \""+profileName+"\",\"profileType\": \"APIKEY\",\"apiProfileKeyValue\":\""+apiKeyValue+"\",\"apiProfileKey\":\""+apiProfileKey+"\"";
}
if (profileType.toUpperCase()=="BASIC"){
	username=$BHIP_Integration_API_Security_Profile_BASIC_Auth_Username
  password=$BHIP_Integration_API_Security_Profile_BASIC_Auth_Password
  profileObj="\"name\": \""+profileName+"\",\"profileType\": \"BASIC\",\"username\":\""+username+"\",\"password\":\""+password+"\""
}

payload="{"+environmentId+","+profileObj+"}"

WriteToOperationLog("Payload for authprof creation for the type "+ profileType + " : "+payload)

$jt=payload


</javascript>

})

$jsonObj = JSON.stringify({
  "name": $hom_webhook_name,
  "action": action,
  "callback": {
    "url": $api_url + $homEndPointPath,

    }
  },
  "payload_fields": ["ALL"],
  "type": "INCIDENT",
  "config": {
    "retryintervalinmillisecond": 60000,
    "retryCount": 2,
    "concurrentRequest": 5
  }
});

</javascript>

components.name: Summary Logs
components.scriptBody:
<trans>

WriteToOperationLog("<------Inside Summary Logs------>");
//$ErrorLogs= $jitterbit.operation.previous.error;
if(Length($summaryLogs) > 0 || Length($errorLogs) > 0
,
$LogsWritten = true;
);
// log f
// log files available
If($LogsWritten,
  // read log files
  
  // construct summary log
  $summaryData = "----- Integration Summary -----"
    + "\nTotal records succeeded : " + String($successCount)
    + "\nTotal records failed : " + String($failureCount) + "\n\n"
    + "----- Record Level Summary -----\n"
    + $summaryLogs + "\n"
    + "----- Error Summary -----\n"
    + $errorLogs; 

  // construct data errors log
  $dataErrors = "----- Integration Summary -----"
    + "\nTotal records succeeded : " + String($successCount)
    + "\nTotal records failed : " + String($failureCount) + "\n\n"
    + "----- Error Summary -----\n"
    + $errorLogs;

// no log files available (there were no records to process)
,
  // construct summary logs for no records
       $summaryData = "----- Integration Summary -----\n"
  + "Total records succeeded : " + String($successCount) + "\n"
   + "Total records failed : " + String($failureCount) + "\n\n"
    + "----- Record Level Summary -----\n"
    + "no records to process";
  
  // construct data errors for no records
   $dataErrors = "----- Integration Summary -----\n"
    + "Total records succeeded : " + String($successCount) + "\n"
    + "Total records failed : " + String($failureCount) + "\n\n"
    + "----- Data Errors -----\n"
    + "no records to process";
);
WriteToOperationLog($summaryData + "\n" + $dataErrors);
// write formatted logs to file
//WriteFile("<TAG>activity:tempstorage/Write-SummaryLogs/tempstorage_write/Write-SummaryLogs</TAG>", summaryLog);
//WriteFile("<TAG>activity:tempstorage/Write-ErrorLogs/tempstorage_write/Write-ErrorLogs</TAG>", dataErrors);
FlushAllFiles();
</trans>

    + "----- Record Level Summary -----\n"
    + "no records to process";
  
  
   $dataErrors = "----- Integration Summary -----\n"
    + "Total records succeeded : " + String($successCount) + "\n"
    + "Total records failed : " + String($failureCount) + "\n\n"
    + "----- Data Errors -----\n"
    + "no records to process";
);
WriteToOperationLog($summaryData + "\n" + $dataErrors);



FlushAllFiles();
</trans>

components.name: Validate HTTP Status Code
components.scriptBody:
<trans>

ArgumentList(msg, respCode, statusVar);
//If(IsNull(respCode), respCode = 200);
If(IsNull(statusVar), statusVar = "jitterbit.target.http.status_code");

// Validate HTTP Status Code
//respCode = String(respCode);
WriteToOperationLog("Expected HTTP Status Code ::= " + respCode);
WriteToOperationLog("Actual HTTP Status Code ::= " + String(Get(statusVar)));
//respCode = Split(respCode, "|");
//If(!Exist(String(Get(statusVar)), respCode) , RaiseError(msg));
if(Get(statusVar) < 200 || Get(statusVar) > 299, RaiseError(msg)); 

</trans>

components.name: Logging and Notification Rollup 1
components.scriptBody:
<trans>
/*
Reads logging files set in the Canonical to Target portion of the project. Prints
out the success/failure counters and emails data erros (if $BHIP_Email_Data_Error == true) 
as well as a summary (if $BHIP_Email_Summary == true) of the integration.

Files written in Canonical to Target:
  - Success Count
  - Failure Count
  - Data Error
  - Summary Log
*/

WriteToOperationLog("--------Integration Summary-------------");
WriteToOperationLog("Success Count " + $successCount);
WriteToOperationLog("Failure Count " + $failureCount);


RunScript("<TAG>script:Setup Email Notification</TAG>");

$successCount = If($successCount < 0, WriteToOperationLog("No Success Count File Found"));
$failureCount = If($failureCount < 0, WriteToOperationLog("No Failure Count File Found"));

// send data erros to the configured recipients


WriteToOperationLog("Email content for Error ::"+$dataErrors);
WriteToOperationLog("Email content for Success ::"+$summaryData);


If($BHIP_Email_Enabled, 
WriteToOperationLog("about to send email");
If($BHIP_Email_Data_Error == 'true' && Length($errorLogs) != 0,
$EmailSubject = "SERVICE NOW INCIDENT -> HOM EVENT Data Errors";
$EmailMessage =  If(Length($errorLogs) == 0 ,"No Data Error File Found", "Data Error\n" +$dataErrors);
emailErrorMessage =  SendEmailMessage("<TAG>email:Log Results</TAG>");
WriteToOperationLog("this is from email_data_error = true;" + emailErrorMessage);
If(Bool(Length(emailErrorMessage)),
  WriteToOperationLog("Failed to send email. Error message: " + emailErrorMessage);
  );
);

// send a summary of the integration to the configured recipients
If($BHIP_Email_Summary == 'true',
$EmailSubject ="SERVICE NOW INCIDENT -> HOM EVENT Summary Log";
$EmailMessage = If(Length($summaryLogs) == 0 ,"No Summary Log File Found", "Summary\n" +$summaryData);
emailErrorMessage = SendEmailMessage("<TAG>email:Log Results</TAG>");
WriteToOperationLog("this is from email_summary = true;" + emailErrorMessage);
If(Bool(Length(emailErrorMessage)),
  WriteToOperationLog("Failed to send email. Error message: " + emailErrorMessage);
  );
);
);

</trans>

<trans>

RunScript("<TAG>script:Parse JSON</TAG>");
WriteToOperationLog("Count of results after querying : "+Count($jsonObj['result']));
if(Count($jsonObj['result']) > 0,
$BHOM_ci_id=$jsonObj['result'][0]['sys_id'];
$BHOM_location=$jsonObj['result'][0]['category'];
$BHOM_modelname=$jsonObj['result'][0]['subcategory'];
$BHOM_install_status=$jsonObj['result'][0]['install'];
$BHOM_name=$jsonObj['result'][0]['name'];
,
// If there is no record for Correlation id
$BHOM_ci_id='';
$BHOM_location='';
$BHOM_modelname='';
$BHOM_install_status='';
$BHOM_name=''

);

</trans>

components.name: HOM Parse Webhooks
components.scriptBody:
<trans>

// Validate HTTP Status Code
RunScript("<TAG>script:Validate HTTP Status Code</TAG>", "Failed to get HOM Webhooks details", "200|204", "jitterbit.source.http.status_code");

// Parse JSON
RunScript("<TAG>script:Parse JSON</TAG>");

// Check for existence of HOM webhook with same name
If(HasKey($jsonObj, "response"), 
  i = 0;
  flag = true;
  While(flag && i < Length($jsonObj["response"]),
    homWebhookObj = $jsonObj["response"][i];
    If(homWebhookObj["name"] == $hom_webhook_name, 
      // Set jsonObj to empty string for delete operation
      flag = false;
      $jsonObj = "";
      If(!RunOperation("<TAG>operation:HOM Delete Webhook</TAG>"), RaiseError(GetLastError()));
    );
    i++;
  );
);

</trans>

      flag = false;
      $jsonObj = "";
      If(!RunOperation("<TAG>operation:HOM Delete Webhook</TAG>"), RaiseError(GetLastError()));
    );
    i++;
  );
);

</trans>

components.name: Parse JSON
components.scriptBody:
<javascript>

/* 
   Assumption is that JB_Data global variable is storing the JSON string. 
   Parsed JSON will be stored back in JB_Data global variable.
*/
// Log JSON Data
if($jsonObj == "") {
  $jsonObj = "{}";
}
WriteToOperationLog("JSON Data ::= " + $jsonObj);

// Massage JSON Data to handle null values
$jsonObj = $jsonObj.replace(/"null"/g, '""').replace(/null/g, '""');

// Parse JSON
$jsonObj = JSON.parse($jsonObj);

</javascript>

components.name: FlowDecider
components.scriptBody:
<trans>
$snowHomCommentPrefix="Updated by SNOW";
$homSnowCommentPrefix="Updated by HOM";
RunScript("<TAG>script:Parse Webhook Payload</TAG>");
WriteToOperationLog("$json['action']:"+ $json['action']);
if(ToUpper($json['action']) == 'CREATE' || ToUpper($json['action']) == 'INCIDENT',
	if(ToUpper($json['action']) == 'INCIDENT',
  	WriteToOperationLog("Webhook creation call, so skipping it");
  ,
	status=RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Initialization and Driver Script HOM</TAG>");
  if(!status,
  	RaiseError("HOM sync got failed : "+ $jitterbit.operation.previous.error);
  );
  );
  ,
  WriteToOperationLog("SNOW Execution");
  RunOperation("<TAG>operation:Initialization and Driver Script SNOW</TAG>");
);
</trans>
